name: Silent Hill: The Escape (Demo)
description:
Silent Hill: The Escape is a remake of the 2008 mobile game. We made this for the 7DFPS 2022 game jam.

How To Play
W - move forward
A/D - turn left/right
S - quick turn around
Click - shoot
Right Click - reload

To maximize the effectiveness of your reload line up the loader with the cylinder. Left Click to finalize the reload.

Objective
Make your way through the maze to find a key to unlock the elevator at the end of each stage. Improve your rank by killing fewer enemies, being accurate with your shots and taking the shortest path in the shortest time.

Still To Come
We'll be adding the remaining four levels and all four endings to the game after the jam. During that stretch we'll also be polishing some stuff for the game. If you have any feedback we'd greatly appreciate it.
